_README: 3. minVotingPower: MUST BE IN LOVELACE (Integers Only)
4. electionName: The title displayed on the dashboard
5. FEATURE FLAGS: Set showRegister, showVote, showResults to true/false to toggle visibility.
6. MIN/MAX Votes: minVotes and maxVotes define the range of candidates a user must/can vote for (Multi-Candidate Voting).

7. PRODUCTION NOTE: For production, critical settings like PORT, RATE_LIMIT_MAX, and RICK_ROLL_URL should be set via Environment Variables (ENV) for security and deployment management. The ENV variables will override these JSON values if set in the server environment.
8. SAVE and RESTART server (node server.js) to apply.
